sentences.sContent: I may go to America or I may not,it all depends.
sentences.sCn: 我也许去美国，也许不去，要视情况而定。

sentences.sContent: She scampered in London then went back to America.
sentences.sCn: 她在伦敦匆忙地游览了一番，然后回到了美国。

sentences.sContent: Some of the mountains in America have not yet been mapped out.
sentences.sCn: 美洲有些山脉还没有在地图上标出来。

sentences.sContent: ...I'd like to get back to the 18th century and perhaps in colonial America in Yankee new England where one of my ancestors lived...
...I hope that you and your family would come and visit America one day...
...America has a social environment that is particularly favorable to innovation...
...In 2009 sales at full-service restaurants in America fell by more than 6%...
...In order to avoid other legislation in America and elsewhere...
...Children in America are being treated with shocking cruelty...
...it seems disgusting and shocking in America with its child-centered culture...
...In North America the rules are fairly simple...
...We knew God gave America no more beautiful location...

synos.tran: 美国；美洲（包括北美和南美洲）

phrases.pCn: 中美洲（位于墨西哥与南美洲之间）；中美洲各国
早安美国（美国广播公司早间节目的名称）
中美洲（墨西哥及美洲中部）
英属北美；英国保险公会北美洲保险区域

words.tran: 美国精神；美国风格；美国腔

trans.tranOther: a name commonly used for the US
